en: Counterattacks when enemy attack is survived.
Repairs all adjacent units for 2 points each turn.
Deal 4 points of damage to any enemy unit.
Deal 6 points of damage to any enemy unit.
Deal 7 points of damage to any enemy unit.
Reduce structure of all enemy units orbiting the planet by 1 each turn.
Reduce structure of all enemy units orbiting the planet by 2 each turn.
Destroy one of your units and deal damage equal to it's structure to an adjacent enemy unit ignoring shields.
Gain control over the enemy unit if damage is greater than or equal to structure.
Remove 2 random cards from your opponents hand.
Gain control of an enemy planet.
Spawns a light fighter each turn if free space is available.
Damage is reduced by 1 after attacking.
